title: Move all Beacon APIs from gRPC to HTTP
body:
With https://github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/issues/12635 closed, all Beacon API endpoints used by the Prysm VC have been moved to HTTP. The next step is to convert the remaining endpoints:

- [ ] "/eth/v1/beacon/states/{state_id}/root",
- [ ] "/eth/v1/beacon/states/{state_id}/sync_committees",
- [ ] "/eth/v1/beacon/states/{state_id}/randao",
- [ ] "/eth/v2/beacon/blocks/{block_id}",
- [ ] "/eth/v1/beacon/blocks/{block_id}/attestations",
- [ ] "/eth/v1/beacon/blinded_blocks/{block_id}",
- [ ] "/eth/v1/beacon/pool/attester_slashings",
- [ ] "/eth/v1/beacon/pool/proposer_slashings",
- [x] "/eth/v1/beacon/pool/bls_to_execution_changes",
- [x] "/eth/v1/beacon/pool/bls_to_execution_changes",
- [ ] "/eth/v1/node/identity",
- [ ] "/eth/v1/node/peers",
- [ ] "/eth/v1/node/peers/{peer_id}",
- [ ] "/eth/v1/node/peer_count",
- [ ] "/eth/v1/node/version",
- [ ] "/eth/v1/node/health",
- [ ] "/eth/v1/debug/beacon/states/{state_id}",
- [ ] "/eth/v2/debug/beacon/states/{state_id}",
- [ ] "/eth/v1/debug/beacon/heads",
- [ ] "/eth/v2/debug/beacon/heads",
- [ ] "/eth/v1/debug/fork_choice",
- [ ] "/eth/v1/config/fork_schedule",
- [ ] "/eth/v1/config/spec",
- [ ] "/eth/v1/events",
- [ ] "/eth/v1/validator/blocks/{slot}",
- [ ] "/eth/v2/validator/blocks/{slot}",
- [ ] "/eth/v1/validator/blinded_blocks/{slot}",
